description: A column for server side printing.

description.description: A human readable description of this column.

format.description: An OpenAPI type definition for this column. The '`name`' format is applied to the primary identifier column to assist in clients identifying column for the resource name.

jsonPath.description: A simple JSON path (i.e. with array notation) which is evaluated against each custom resource to produce the value for this column.

name.description: A human readable name for the column.

priority.description: An integer defining the relative importance of this column compared to others. Lower numbers are considered higher priority. Columns that may be omitted in limited space scenarios should be given a priority greater than 0.

type.description: An OpenAPI type definition for this column.
